sentence.Network_en: He dares to prophesy what will happen in the future.
sentence.Network_cn: 他敢预言未来将发生什么事.

sentence.Network_en: I prophesy that he'll be back in the old job.
Monks and nuns who prophesy are not of that rareness.
sentence.Network_cn: 说预言的修士和修女,很少有这个祥子的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: prophecy 预言prophesy 预言propitiate 使息怒,抚慰

list.abs: cruel house price , crueler prophesy ., 残酷的房价更残酷的预言.
He was a prophet . He prophesied many things ., 他是个预言家 . 他预言了许多事情.
The gypsy prophesied her a happy marriage ., 那个吉卜赛人预言她的婚姻将很美满.
around this time , Makati's old foe Kadann seemingly made a fatal move : he to grab power by prophesying himself ruler of the Empire .在这期间，马卡蒂的死敌卡丹看起来正在做出一个自寻死路的决定：他试图通过预言自己为帝国统治者的方式来攫取权力。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French profecier, from profecie (see prophecy). The differentiation of the spellings prophesy and prophecy as verb and noun was not established until after 1700

entry.def: If you prophesy that something will happen, you say that you strongly believe that it will happen.

example.ex: He prophesied that within five years his opponent would either be dead or in prison...
example.tran: 他预言5年内他的敌人要么会死去，要么会进监狱。

example.ex: She prophesied a bad ending for the expedition.
example.tran: 她预言这次探险结局不会好。

means.word_mean: 1. predict or reveal through, or as if through, divine inspiration

sentences.sentence: "The minister is not preaching this Sunday"

auth_sentence.content: The variant spelling prophesy is...now confined to the verb.
auth_sentence.res_content: The variant spelling prophesy is...now confined to the verb.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The variant spelling prophesy is...now confined to the verb.

auth_sentence.content: To prophesy rashly...there will be no air attack on London.
auth_sentence.res_content: To prophesy rashly...there will be no air attack on London.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To prophesy rashly...there will be no air attack on London.

auth_sentence.content: You could even claim that this is still consistent with the Star Prophesy.
auth_sentence.res_content: You could even claim that this is still consistent with the Star Prophesy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You could even claim that this is still consistent with the Star Prophesy.

sentences.en: The first explosion of the atomic bomb prophesied of change and a new age.
sentences.cn: 原子弹的首次爆炸预示着变化和一个新时代的来临。
